jobDescription: Registered Veterinary Technician or Assistant Bay Area - Emergency - ER - Full TimeWho we are: We at SAGE Centers are growing every single day! Our incredible teams are dedicated to providing the highest level of specialized, compassionate, and collaborative veterinary care in the industry.We are looking for a new RVT or Assistant for our ER Department at our gorgeous Redwood City Hospital!
